channel.title: Tic Tac Toe JS :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: JQuery Script Tag In some older videos, the JQuery script tag is shown using http in the URL. This should be changed to https in order to work correctly due to some recent browser security updates. Alternatively, you can always find the correct JQuery script tag by visiting https://releases.jquery.com/ and clicking the “uncompressed” link next to the latest version of JQuery. Resources Slides Video Script Welcome back everyone. In this video, we’re going to start making our Tic Tac Toe game a little bit more interesting by enabling us to actually play the game.
